items.sentence: In the early afternoon, Tom decided that he just had to get out of the house.
I didn\'t want to spend any more time trying to convince Tom to study French.
I don\'t see how Tom can stay up all night and then be so wide awake at work.
I wonder whether or not Tom has ever told Mary about what we did on that day.
Mary dreamed that one day she would meet a prince and they would get married.
